name: Using Figma above and beyond in design teams - Config 2022
description:
Slides to follow along for Config 2022.


In the talk, we'll explore how we at Swiggy Design make our lives easier by developing Figma plugins. How we leverage this capability to solve design problems, automate repetitive tasks and focus on the meaningful stuff.


Reach me out on Twitter for any questions, suggestions or if you just wanna drop a hi!
